<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Exploding Shield](/Equipment.aspx?ID=730)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 260 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Price** 25 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** 1
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Shield** [Wooden Shield](/Shields.aspx?ID=2)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

The magic within this [wooden shield](/Shields.aspx?ID=2) (Hardness 3, HP 12, BT 6) lashes out at your foes as the shield is destroyed.

<document level="2" id="action-577" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
